DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare effectiveness soft occlusal splint therapy electromyographic activity masticatory muscle ( ateriors temporalis masseter ) application muscle relaxation splint . Electromyography recording masseter anterior temporalis muscle analyze quantitatively maximal clench , rest mastication usual , treatment without splint . Ten patient whose chief complaint Temporomandibular Disorders ( TMD ) select study . After initial evaluation soft occlusal splint ( muscle relaxation splint ) apply , patient instruct use splint four week . Surface electromyographic recording take patient , clinical evaluation TMD ( Index Helkimo ) , evaluation begin clinical therapy four week wear splint . The data obtain analyzed Wilcoxon´s Friedman´s test .
DOC.brief_title: Resilient Occlusal Patients With Temporomandibular Disorder ( TMD )
DOC.criteria: Patients clinical and/or diagnosis TMD With complaint muscle disorder / joint pain , pain symptom Presence occlusal interference Minimum 20 functional teeth oral cavity subsequent bilateral occlusion Individuals extensive dental flaw Orthodontic treatment progress History systemic disease advance arthritis , diabetes conservative reversible treatment occlusal splint recommend
